DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate sensor-off feature Pulse oximeter display per specification sensor remove finger .
DOC.brief_title: Pulse Oximetry- Evaluating Sensor Off- PCBA-1
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject 18 old ( inclusive ) . 2 . Subject able participate duration study 3 . Subject willing sign inform consent 1 . Previous injury trauma finger hand may change blood flow vascular supply affect ability test sensor 2 . Physiologic abnormalities prevent proper application medical sensor electrode 3 . Severe contact allergy cause reaction standard adhesive material find medical sensor electrode
